text: aur tum soory ko usake udit hote samay dekhate to dikhaee deta ki vah unakee gupha se daahinee or ko bachakar nikal jaata hai aur jab ast hota hai to unakee baee or se kataraakar nikal jaata hai. aur ve hai ki us (gupha) ke ek vistrt sthaan mein hain. yah allaah kee nishaaniyon mein se hai. jise allaah maarg dikhae, vahee maarg paanevaala hai aur jise vah bhatakata chhod de usaka tum koee sahaayak maargadarshak kadaapi na paoge
